details: Developed and maintained the company website using React and Redux.
Collaborated with designers to implement responsive UI/UX designs.
Optimized web applications for maximum speed and scalability.
Assisted in the development of client websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Participated in code reviews and team meetings to improve coding standards.
Maintained documentation for web development projects.
Supported the design team with creating mockups and prototypes.
Conducted research on web design trends and best practices.
Helped in testing and debugging web applications.
Built and maintained personal and client websites using various web technologies.
Managed project timelines and communicated with clients to ensure satisfaction.
Implemented SEO best practices to improve website visibility.
Contributed to various open-source projects on GitHub.
Fixed bugs and added features to improve project functionality.
Collaborated with other developers to review code and suggest improvements.
Developed and maintained websites for local non-profit organizations.
Provided technical support and training to staff members on website management.
Helped increase online presence and engagement through effective web design.
Wrote articles and tutorials on web development topics.
Shared insights and experiences to help others in the tech community.
Engaged with readers through comments and social media.
Created and delivered online courses on web development.
Developed course materials, including videos, quizzes, and assignments.
Provided feedback and support to students throughout the course.
